# App0Jfxx.Thumbnail3bppRgb property

The thumbnail image in 3-bytes-per-pixel RGB format.

```csharp
public ThumbnailImage3bppRgb? Thumbnail3bppRgb { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

This must only be non-`null` if ThreeBytesPerPixelRgb is ThreeBytesPerPixelRgb.
